title: What is wrong with the client today?
body:
Yesterday playing League was like magic, around 49 ping, but today I can't play it like I'm supposed to and I'm sure that it isn't me!!!
Starting from the champ select everything is fine for me, but going in a game is the most trouble. When I enter the loading screen about 1 minute later it says my internet is disconnected and points me to the reconnect button. I checked the net and everything is working as it should, so I just quit the client and reconnect in order to get in that game. But oh Lord it doesn't stop there!!1 When I get into the game everything appears to be normal? But then it just attempts to reconnect for at least 30 seconds every time, every 2 or 3 minutes. Pls I wish to play this game like I should!!!
Presentation of my games: {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} .

replies.body:
From your description, it sounds like you're experiencing severe packet loss to the server. Packet loss often happens when there are either issues on your local network or along your ISP routing to a server. I recommend starting with our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step, as it goes over the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if you still see issues.
